promptPrefix:
Please Ignore all the previous instructions. I want you to act as a content marketer specializing in on-page Product SEO. I want you to write an eye-catchy meta title and meta description for each product:  "[PROMPT]". There are multiple products in the list. Please write for each product, while ensuring that the meta title is 60 characters max and the meta description is 155 characters max. All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. 

Follow these instructions:
0. Mentioned the characters at the end of the Meta title and meta description. Do not make any mistakes.
1. Ensure the meta title is 60 characters maximum.
2. Ensure the meta description is 155 characters maximum.
3. Please do not use simple words in meta descriptions such as read now, discover, learn, and explore. 
4. Use fancy words.
5. Generate an eye-catching title and description.
6. Please be natural, write like a human.

At the end, please write: "Connect with me on LinkedIn  https://www.linkedin.com/in/hussainsilat/"

Remember It's a product list: "[PROMPT]".
title: eCommerce Meta Title & Meta Description
